title: The Big Bang Theory (2007–…): Season 1, Episode 1  - Pilot - full transcript

questions.question: What is the topic Sheldon and another character discuss at the beginning of the episode?
options: The benefits of having a high-IQ sperm bank
The double-slit experiment and its implications
The importance of proper stair design
The best way to solve a crossword puzzle
questions.correct_answer: The double-slit experiment and its implications
questions.explanation: The episode starts with a conversation about the double-slit experiment and its implications on the behavior of photons.

questions.question: Why do Leonard and Sheldon go to the high-IQ sperm bank?
options: To get a free medical checkup
questions.explanation: Leonard and Sheldon go to the sperm bank to donate sperm for money, specifically to get faster internet.

questions.question: What is Penny's job?
questions.explanation: Penny tells Leonard and Sheldon that she works as a waitress at The Cheesecake Factory.

questions.question: What is the name of the song playing in the background when Penny meets Leonard and Sheldon?
questions.explanation: The song playing in the background when Penny meets Leonard and Sheldon is 'Smile' by Lily Allen.

questions.question: Why does Sheldon not want Penny to sit in his spot?
options: Because it's too close to the radiator
Because it's too far from the TV
Because it creates a parallax distortion
questions.correct_answer: Because it creates a parallax distortion and other reasons
questions.explanation: Sheldon explains that his spot is optimal because it's close to the radiator but not too close, and it faces the TV at an angle that's neither direct nor too wide, and also because of the cross breeze in the summer.

questions.question: What is the reason for Leonard and Sheldon's visit to Penny's ex-boyfriend's place?
questions.explanation: Penny asks Leonard to pick up her TV from her ex-boyfriend's place, and Leonard and Sheldon go there to retrieve it.

questions.question: What is Howard's profession?
questions.explanation: Howard introduces himself as an Applied Physicist from CalTech.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Leonard and Sheldon's visit to Penny's ex-boyfriend's place?
options: They get into a fight with the ex-boyfriend
They meet the ex-boyfriend's new girlfriend
Leonard gets his pants pulled down
questions.correct_answer: Leonard gets his pants pulled down
questions.explanation: Leonard's pants get pulled down by Penny's ex-boyfriend.

questions.question: What does Sheldon say about the possibility of a romantic relationship with Penny?
options: He is very interested in her
He thinks she is out of his league
He is not interested in her at all
He wants to be friends with her
questions.correct_answer: He thinks she is out of his league
questions.explanation: Sheldon tells Leonard that he thinks Penny is out of his league after the incident at her ex-boyfriend's place.

questions.question: What is the activity that Leonard and Penny decide to do together at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation: Penny invites Leonard to dinner as a thank you for trying to retrieve her TV.

questions.question: What type of cuisine does Raj suggest for dinner?
questions.explanation: Raj suggests going to a sushi bar that also has karaoke.

questions.question: What is the reason Sheldon gives for not being able to carry a TV?
options: The two of them can't even carry a TV
questions.correct_answer: The two of them can't even carry a TV
questions.explanation: Sheldon says that the two of them can't even carry a TV, implying that they are not physically capable of doing so.

questions.question: What does Howard say about his work?
options: He is working on a top-secret project
He is taking high-resolution digital photographs of Jupiter's largest moon
He is studying the effects of gravity on plant growth
He is developing a new type of computer chip
questions.correct_answer: He is taking high-resolution digital photographs of Jupiter's largest moon
questions.explanation: Howard tells Penny that his work is currently orbiting Jupiter's largest moon, taking high-resolution digital photographs.

questions.question: What is Penny's astrological sign?
questions.explanation: Penny tells Leonard and Sheldon that she is a Sagittarius.

questions.question: What does Sheldon say about Penny's astrological sign?
questions.explanation: Sheldon tells Penny that believing in astrological signs is a mass cultural delusion.

questions.question: What is the name of the restaurant where Penny works?
questions.explanation: Penny tells Leonard and Sheldon that she works at The Cheesecake Factory.

questions.question: What is the reason for Sheldon's hesitation to have Penny use their shower?
options: He is concerned about water usage
questions.explanation: Sheldon says that having Penny use their shower would be weird.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Penny's use of the shower?
options: Nothing out of the ordinary happens
questions.correct_answer: Nothing out of the ordinary happens
questions.explanation: Penny uses the shower without any issues.

questions.question: What does Sheldon say about his relationship with Penny?
options: He is in love with her
He is just friends with her
He thinks she is out of his league
He is not interested in her
questions.correct_answer: He thinks she is out of his league
questions.explanation: Sheldon tells Leonard that he thinks Penny is out of his league.

questions.question: What is the activity that Leonard and Penny do together at the end of the episode?
options: They go to a karaoke bar
questions.explanation: Penny invites Leonard to dinner as a thank you for trying to retrieve her TV.

questions.question: What type of cuisine does Sheldon object to having for dinner?
questions.explanation: Sheldon objects to having Thai food for dinner because they had Indian food for lunch, and both are curry-based cuisines, making it gastronomically redundant.

questions.question: What is the name of the song that Leonard and Penny sing at the karaoke bar?
questions.explanation: The song that Leonard and Penny sing at the karaoke bar is 'Baby, Baby'.

questions.question: What is Howard's comment about his work?
options: It's currently orbiting Jupiter's largest moon
It's taking high-resolution digital photographs of the Earth
It's studying the effects of gravity on plant growth
It's developing a new type of computer chip
questions.correct_answer: It's currently orbiting Jupiter's largest moon
questions.explanation: Howard tells Penny that his work is currently orbiting Jupiter's largest moon, taking high-resolution digital photographs.

questions.question: What does Sheldon say about his intelligence?
questions.explanation: Sheldon implies that he is a genius, but also says that he will not win a Nobel Prize.

questions.question: What is the name of the character who says 'I'm a vegetarian, no, except for fish, and the occasional steak'
questions.explanation: Penny tells Leonard and Sheldon that she is a vegetarian, except for fish and the occasional steak.

questions.question: What does Sheldon say about the concept of astrological signs?
options: It's a way to predict the future
questions.explanation: Sheldon tells Penny that believing in astrological signs is a mass cultural delusion.

questions.question: What is the reason for Leonard's visit to Penny's ex-boyfriend's place?
options: To invite the ex-boyfriend to dinner
questions.explanation: Penny asks Leonard to pick up her TV from her ex-boyfriend's place.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Leonard's visit to Penny's ex-boyfriend's place?
options: He gets into a fight with the ex-boyfriend
He meets the ex-boyfriend's new girlfriend
He gets his pants pulled down
